title: Mcp-Server-Google-Analytics
description: An MCP server implementation for accessing Google Analytics 4 (GA4) data with features like page view metrics, user engagement, and custom event analysis.
creator: ruchernchong

GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: The email associated with your Google Cloud service account.

GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private key for your Google Cloud service account.

GA_PROPERTY_ID.description: The Google Analytics 4 property ID to fetch data from.
